website_summaries.verdict: A very affordable stain remover that is still great at removing tough stains.
pros: Gel formula sticks to clothes and removes tough stains
Safe on colors and in any water temperature
cons: Some had issues with the sprayer

customer_reviews.title: Bottles busted in shipping but product is magic!
customer_reviews.text: One of the bottles was leaking in the box. Which then turned into it breaking. But the product itself is a 10. So I still gave it a 5. It does so well on our stroller and high chair as well as clothes. Love this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Sarf

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me. I got it to use for pit stains on my husbands white tees. I sprayed, scrubbed, soaked (along with some bleach), and nothing. What DID work wonderfully was Dawn - go figure.
customer_reviews.author: JGGaia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Wouldn't be without it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST stain removing product I found. I have used regular Shout for years and highly recommend it also. In the past two years I switched to the Advanced Shout which seems to do an even better job with things like tomato paste, red wine, red cranberry juice, blueberry and strawberry stains, etc. I keep it handy in my laundry room, my closet and even keep some in my travel bag. It has saved more clothes from the trash bin than I can remember. It works fast, does not leave a shadow or mark, and does not fade colors. Suffice it to say, I'm a believer and I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Unrue

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me (update/ it works)
customer_reviews.text: Sadly it didn’t work for me, I have 3 kids 5 & under so I’m looking for a good stain remover, this one didn’t get any stains out at all 😔 I will try again and let ya know! UPDATE! So I must not have scrubbed hard/long enough on the stains the last time, it does work very well on most stains. Some stains just won’t come out though lol. Also it removes armpit stains!! Iv never had a stain remover remove the armpit stains!! And it makes the clothes smell AMAZING. The bottle says to let set for 5 mins I let it set for a little longer (I have three little ones so it’s needed 😝).
customer_reviews.author: Casey Jo Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.  Now
customer_reviews.text: Best stain remover. Grass stains? Blood? Mac and cheese? Sometimes gets out tomato sauce first time. But most times takes me to line dry and treat and wash again till the yellowish leftover tomato stain is gone. I have twin 4 year olds that love to get messy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Completely satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great and getting stains removed
customer_reviews.text: Works great my dog broke make up on the floor and this took the stain right out with some scrubbing. I've used it for chocolate stains on clothes as well and it comes out without any scrubbing, I just simply sprayed it and threw it in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: BAM BAM

customer_reviews.title: Best stain remover!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stain remover, only one that has worked on all of the various messes I get myself into. Can't find it at the local store I used to buy it at...wonder why...thanks Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: LizK67

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the same formula as the Shout Gel Advanced smaller bottle, as far as I can tell. Except this one costs 1/4 the price and you get 4x as much. Works for 95% of stains I've brought it against. Pre-treating is necessary for more set-in stains. Never had an issue with colorfastness, I never test it though. Who has time to spray a test area, wash, and then do it again?
customer_reviews.author: JDH

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I got this product to get some small, spotty chocolate stains out of a white skirt I had. I did exactly what the bottle said: sprayed it directly on the stain, rubbed the fabric together on that portion, and waited at least five minutes before washing. I would say the key to making this remover work is the rubbing portion, as I noticed another stain I used it on was a LOT tougher to remove without doing this. I would say all in all it’s a good stain remover, sometimes needing a little effort to make it work (but mostly it is effective). Good value for money so can’t really complain.
customer_reviews.author: avid amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Does not remove grease stain
customer_reviews.text: I had some grease stains on my shirt from cooking and tried using this stain remover. I sprayed the area a few times and then rubbed the fabric together. Waited a few days and washed it. Unfortunately there was no difference. Thinking that it's not effective after a few days (even though it mentions up to a week), I sprayed the spot again and rubbed it. Waited about 15 minutes while it's still wet and washed it again. The outcome was the same.
customer_reviews.author: HF

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is magic
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how they made this, but it’s amazing stuff. I had a new pair of sneakers that I got soaked in transmission fluid, and motor oil. The fluid soaked in and unfortunately I left them for over a week like that. I bought this purely off the reviews, and I’m glad I did. I sprayed this all over the sneakers, scrubbed them with a brush, rinsed them and left them to dry. They literally look brand new, not even a hint of the stains left... motor oil... crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Dave-D

customer_reviews.title: Almost as good as the white one
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy the white version of Shout. But I saw that this one has better reviews so I gave it a try even though it was more expensive than the regular one. Kinda disappointed in it. Some stains that can normally and easily be removed, by the other regular shout, are not removed. Moreover, it changed the color of my son's light green shirt. The spot where I sprayed turns orange. This basically ruined the shirt! Some chocolate stain also stayed and can't be removed. I recommend the white Shout, not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mint

customer_reviews.title: Great Multi purpose stain remover.
customer_reviews.text: Works great on laundry stains AND Pre-treating carpet stains before steam cleaning. Test on carpet in your closet for colorfastness before using. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: KristieLynn

customer_reviews.title: It's OK, not great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to remove a chocolate stain on one of my favorite shirts and it that I have tried to remove in many washes. I will admit that it looks a lot better after the treatment, but it's not completely gone. On a scale from 0 being no change and 10 being no sign of the stain at all, I would give this product a 6 and a half. Hope this helps you in your purchase decision.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Thomasian

customer_reviews.title: Takes away stains like magic!
customer_reviews.text: I always use this on my clothes before washing - it works awesome! I have a 2 year old boy and an 8 year old daughter, so y'all know there's stains on everything! Prior to washing, I spray the stain 2-3 sprays and load in the washing machine and do what you do. You can also spray on and throw in the hamper if you aren't washing that same day. It removes stains, even ones that have already been washed and dried! I wish the bottle was bigger and a little less expensive, but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Sommer Hallock

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my baby's clothes
customer_reviews.text: I use shout on everything. I recently started using it for stains on my baby's clothes. I was a little hesitant at first just because babies are sensitive. But I've had no issues with my baby breaking out. I simply followed the directions and spray the area, scrub it in, leave it for 5 minutes and afterwards throw it in the washing machine. So far it's taking off every stain from my baby's clothes including stains that have been there previously.
customer_reviews.author: ONLYtheBEST

customer_reviews.title: Treat your stain when it happens then toss in dirty clothes
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to favorite stain remover I pour it into a large spray bottle and use on my husband shirts and anything else that needs treating. Works on my husband shirt collars and any other stains Works on my husband shirt collars and any other stains that need attention . If I have Something that is stained I treat it right away and throw it in the dirty clothes. Works fabulous cause then u can just forget about it
customer_reviews.author: Donitta

customer_reviews.title: didn't work on watercolor paint on shirt
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed this on a tee shirt that I had wiped a waterbrush with watercolor paint, on accidentally. I thought I was using a rag but then realized it was my shirt. I sprayed it on and let it sit for three days before doing the laundry. This didn't work at all, didn't even lessen the brush strokes. Let me say that I was not using some top of the line tubes of watercolor either, I was using watercolor pencils and a kids watercolor set.
customer_reviews.author: A reader, a crafter, a gardener and cookTop Contributor: Aquascaping

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for messy toddlers
customer_reviews.text: When I received this, it was open and leaked all over the other items that were in the box with it. Amazon sent out a replacement quickly. Shout always works well for my messy toddler and explosive newborn.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: bad spray mechanism
customer_reviews.text: was leaking in plastic package it was sent in. when I cleaned it up, tried to spray a stain and got it all over my hand. pump action trigger is defective. can not use without a big mess on my hand and the surrounding counter top. product may be good,but can not tell as trigger is defective.
customer_reviews.author: very rare

customer_reviews.title: Another defective sprayer, but love Shout
customer_reviews.text: I do love Shout. In fact, I had salsa stains on a white t-shirt that Oxiclean didn't touch, and after using what little was left of my old bottle, the stains are gone, even prior to putting in the washer! This stuff is great. BUT, spray nozzle doesn't work at all. Luckily I saved my old bottle so I can just pour it over, but this seems to be a recurring problem over the past several years, now that I see other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Sherm2

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: I always try to buy more natural type stain removers but honestly I'm usually pretty disappointed. I use natural detergents but sometimes you just need to get down and dirty and when that organic/natural stain remover won't get the Sunday Brunch bacon grease out of your clothes, you gotta bring in the big guns. My husband and I don't see eye to eye on anything laundry related, except for this.
customer_reviews.author: jennys

customer_reviews.title: Strong stain remover
customer_reviews.text: I can never where a white shirt and not spill on it. My last stain remover wasn’t strong enough. I usually just use dawn dish soap but needed something a little stronger. This works for getting out all stains from blood to food to grease.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Spray nozzle doesn’t work. Don’t think I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I normally use dreft strain remover spray but decided to try this out since my toddler daughter drew on some furniture with makeup. The spray feature on my bottle doesn’t work so I need to remove the top every time I want to use it which is very annoying. It doesn’t really remove all stains. I have a lot of items that I have pretreated with this product only to have to re-pretreat with a different cleaner. In addition to my toddler I will have a newborn in a few weeks. I think the dreft stain remover works way better. I don’t think I would re-buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this product by the family I nanny for. I do their children’s laundry and was asked to spray this on any stains I come across before washing. It works like a charm! For extra tough stains or stains on white clothes, I spray this first then soak in cold water with some oxy clean stain remover powder for at least 24 hours then wash and the stains never stay! On normal stains I just use the spray and it works like a charm!!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Brant

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORKING
customer_reviews.text: I don`t know how this worked for some people but for me it did not work at all. I have cotton pants and i have a stain from some sauce or something and i can not remove it no matter that i used this 3 times already and left it staying on my pants all night long before i throw them in the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Best stain remover so far
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me on a mother's forum after my one year old started staining 2 pairs of clothes a day learning to eat during mealtimes. So far, it's had no problem getting out tomato sauce, raspberries, and red wine in just a couple minutes. Definitely recommend this to anyone spending as much time as I am doing laundry and attempting to remove stains these days !
customer_reviews.author: Brittany McLaren

customer_reviews.title: Stain remover is great, nozzle doesn't spray
customer_reviews.text: The stain remover works great, but the bottle itself doesn't spray. I have rotated the spout around to all possible angles (both options for off/on), but still nothing. I can hear air coming through the nozzle, but it doesn't actually spray anything. I have to pour the stain remover directly onto the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: AAS

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what everyone is so excited about because I have tried this spray on multiple clothing and materials and the stain remains. I went to use Dreft on the same stains and it came out without effort. I really can't stand these companies who lie about their products.
customer_reviews.author: The Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Shout Advance is Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Without this shout advance I would be throwing away my clothes every few weeks. I work with fried seafood and between the grease, the smells, etc it runs your clothes. I've tried everything on the market and then some, but now just spray them down and wait until wash day!!
customer_reviews.author: TERESA T.

customer_reviews.title: Promise me you’ll never die.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works way better than any other of the Shout products or anything else on the market. I stopped being able to find it in stores for whatever reason, and purchased the white bottle of Shout, but it did not get the stains out. I believe that the advanced action liquid gel is also the highest rated on Consumer Reports. May they never stop making it. At least while I’m still doing laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Sprayer broken - bummer
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about getting this product on amazon. I stored it away in my laundry room until I needed it (which happened to be after the return period expired) When I went to use it I discovered the spray mechanism was faulty. It would be so good if it were useable. I’m sure I’ll find a way to get the stuff used up but it was pretty inconvenient. Such a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: This does not work as well as the Shout squeeze and scrub. I got tomato sauce on my top, IMMEDIATELY removed it, sprayed well, let it sit, then washed. It was didn't get something that easy, and quickly washed, out! Going back to my scrubber gel!
customer_reviews.author: KimberKat

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby's laundry and husband's undershirts!
customer_reviews.text: With a new baby, we do a lot of laundry in my house. The baby spits up or has a blow out and we have to wash items nearly daily. Before we put things into the washer, we pre-treat them with Shout Advanced Action Gel. It works really well. The spit up and baby food comes right out. The blowouts come out 4/5 times depending on the item. Jeans it comes out easier than plain cotton items like sweatpants. I have begun to use this also on my husband's undershirts and socks to keep them brighter.
customer_reviews.author: teach326

customer_reviews.title: No more red wine stain on the white carpet
customer_reviews.text: The BEST stain remover out there! Red wine out of a white area rug? It’s pretty amazing at grass stains as well. Trying on all sorts of accidents in the laundry and the only Hangul I found was car grease. But baking soda came to the rescue with that one!
customer_reviews.author: KML

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on some clothes
customer_reviews.text: While it did an amazing job on some of the stains on my clothes some still remained. It eliminated most of the sauces stains. on some of the clothes it did not fully removed the oil spots. It left a barely visible stain.bet most can't see it but I know it's there 🙃
customer_reviews.author: walter g.

customer_reviews.title: Works well when directions are followed for pre-wash.
customer_reviews.text: The scent is strong but clean and the stain must be treated and rubbed in prior to washing. I used it to remove the blood from the neck of my white terry bathrobe after I fell and had a slit on the back of my head. It worked.
customer_reviews.author: "Sam"

customer_reviews.title: Works for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.text: So I had some clothes that I noticed had stains on them after I washed them so I bought this stuff to get the stains out and worked like a charm. I didn't even have to like blast the one spot I just sprayed the front of the whole shirt. Worked for me!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Berndt & Jackie Lindamood

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my hat. I have a cap with a bill that is light gray and had sweat / sun block residue from many uses. I sprayed and it goes on well, a gel like texture. I finished at soaking the hat in detergent water in the sink and the stain went away completely. I previously tried without it to no luck. Works well
customer_reviews.author: Shin

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive skin, then this is the only one to get bar none.
customer_reviews.text: My husband has such sensitive skin that anything with a fragrance or perfume will make his eggzema break out head to toe and it drive him crazy as almost everything on the market would irritate him, but he insists I use this on all his clothes as he is a proffesional cook so smells tend to come home with him and now he can finally feel clean and not like a child with chicken pox!!
customer_reviews.author: love2dream

customer_reviews.title: Kinda happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: So I was told that Shout would bring stains out of a piece of clothing that has already been washed and dried I did not find that to be true on my side but it did bring out a stain in a purse that I have not Washed or dried yet
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Leaky and non-working spray
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these and one of the spray bottles did not work at all and was leading. The product is fine, and since I purchased a double pack, I hope to be able to refill the working one with the contents of the defective bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Tallgirl

customer_reviews.title: The G.O.A.T. in Stain Fighting Power
customer_reviews.text: Shout has been my go too forever! and now they've taken it to the next level with this beauty that is gel based and really digs in to fight the stains. I've gotten so many different kinds of oils, sauces, etc out of my clothes that I've lost count.
customer_reviews.author: Scot Breithaupt Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great for mechanics and children!
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a shout fan so was happy to see this. My husband's a mechanic so I have ALOT of stains to wash out. This stuff always does the trick! I especially love that it's thicker so it doesn't drip all over and gets all stains out well. It's great for if you have children too, this stuff keeps my kids clothes stain free!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: product as expected, packing/shipping terrible
customer_reviews.text: I love Shout! I, however, DO NOT LOVE, when my Shout gets packed with books an other items that can be damaged by shout. Opened the box, the shout bottle was NOT wrapped, the bottle was cracked and the Shout gel leaked all over my new cookbook (the pages are stuck together and cover is ruined), and all my other stuff that was shipped in the same box. Even more annoying is the fact that the sprayer is also cracked and does not work so now I have to find some other way to use/spray Shout onto my clothes. BIG BUMMER.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I trust this stain remover
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for many years. I won't buy other kind of stain remover. This product didn't ruin any color clothes and remove stain as it should. You need to set the remover on the tough and old stain over night. I spray the gel on the down jackets and it did a good job. Would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Salzburg

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love the original Shout and I thought that this would be great for those really stubborn stains on clothes since this is advertised as being the “advanced formula”. Ya..no. Got a couple simple stains on a few shirts and tried two cycles to try and remove the stains with this and they didn’t even get smaller. Great for the other reviewers who had a good experience- me, not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary P

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work Very Well for Me
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to get some apparently very tough stains out of my toddler's clothes. This hasn't been working very well for me sadly. I spray it directly on the stains, try to let it sit for a little while, I even put it to soak in a dish tub with another laundry stain removing detergent & some of the stains are still there. I'm talking about dirt & food stains on my toddler's clothes. I'm trying oxiclean next...
customer_reviews.author: Jessica VazquezTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Huge disappointment! Grease stains still there!
customer_reviews.text: This product does not remove any kind of grease stains, even the fresh ones! 8 cook and bake a lot, so that is the most frequent stain I have to deal with. This stuff didnt even begging to remove the stains! It was a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda S. Walters

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Shout stain remover for 10 years and find it is the best. I've tried the one in the green bottle which is okay, but I find the Shout to work better and is usually a little cheaper. Plus you can buy the big refill bottle to put add to your sprayer when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Removed mystery set in stain
customer_reviews.text: I had a mystery set in stain on a sweater and a pair of pants. It removed the stain on the sweater but not the pants. Thought all hope was lost for both so I’m happy it saved one at least. Much less messy to use than other stain removal products
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Remove Much
customer_reviews.text: While the gel-based formula is nice, it doesn't work any better than the traditional spray. I don't see where it has removed any stains, maybe just lightened them. Will go back to the original Shout spray once this is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Steven C.

customer_reviews.title: Totally works!
customer_reviews.text: This is a clothes saver! I would definitely recommend this product. It has gotten rid of stains that I hadn’t been able to get rid of with anything else. It doesn’t damage the clothes. Very impressed and happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Bella Reed

customer_reviews.title: didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: got it to get rid of some bad stains on my joggers but even after using it for 10+ time didnt do any chances and the stains was still intact. i won't say it dont works but may be it only works on certain kinds of stains and spils.
customer_reviews.author: सागर बाबु रेग्मी

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a MUST HAVE for human parents, dog parents, or messy people in general! Sprayed and let it set for a bit before washing on HOT with other colors. It got almost every spot out!
customer_reviews.author: Ky B

customer_reviews.title: Life saver.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best stain remover! I have four kids and a mechanic for a husband. This has removed almost every grass,mud,makeup, spit up, grease stain i have come across. Love love love. Definitely a must have in our laundry room.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me. Like the other kind better.
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't work for me. I have used the other Shout Advanced formula for years and it worked. This variation had a high rating so I tried it. COMPLETE BUST!
customer_reviews.author: M. Fields

customer_reviews.title: Good with Grease Stains
customer_reviews.text: I got some grease stains on my favorite jeans once and I forgot about it. About a week later I realized I needed to get this stain out so I bought this Shout stuff. It's pretty good. I got it out of my pants and now they look very clean on my legs!
customer_reviews.author: David Lynch

customer_reviews.title: The best stain remover!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite stain remover! This stuff works like nothing else. It removes grease stains, fruit stains, and whatever else kids get onto their clothes :) I have tried a ton of stuff out there and this stain remover is my best choice.
customer_reviews.author: Runya

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works! I got this mostly to get the stains out of my baby's clothes when he has a blowout. I have used this to get blood stains out as well. This stuff really works great if you follow the directions!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Best Shout Product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shout formula on the market. I’d never seen before in my local stores and wish I had. This is the only shout I will purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Shout definitely gets most of it out
customer_reviews.text: This gel works a little better than regular shout spray. I love being able to get most stains out when I do my laundry. I hit everything, even minor stains to be on the safe side. This stuff will even get Sharpie marker off your skin. I won't go into why I know that!
customer_reviews.author: JJW

customer_reviews.title: Dependable as usual
customer_reviews.text: I will continue to order this product as it is the only stain remover that I have found to work. Additionally, for anyone looking to get old stains out of your shoes, I used this on my workout and running shoes and it got out everything including the dirt on the shoe strings.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Better than the one in the white bottle
customer_reviews.text: I like this one better than the Shout that comes in the white bottle. This does a fantastic job removing hard-to-remove stains. And at least for me, a bottle lasts quite a long time.
customer_reviews.author: R. N. Kinnison

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not great on fats and grease
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I could not get to the grocery store - it is not my usual brand. It does an ok job but not as good on fats and grease as my old stain remover.
customer_reviews.author: Kcuret

customer_reviews.title: Removes set in stains!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for years, the problem was finding the Advanced formula. It removes set in stains, grass stains, grease stains. I decided to try Amazon instead of driving from store to store. WINNER! Loved the price and next day delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Babs H

customer_reviews.title: Every parent needs this!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing for diaper blowouts! I have saved so much of my daughter's clothing because of this spray. I'm sure it will continue to come in handy for years of messes to come. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Erin M

customer_reviews.title: Works better then I expected.....wow!!!
customer_reviews.text: I washed my brand new work pants with my new high visibility work shirts. Needless to say....,black spots everywhere. Totally ruined. I sprayed everything..every inch. And let it sit for 30 hours. And my shirts look like brand new.its crazy good!!!! Spray it good. Let it sit. Wash...and whoa. HR would have had a fit I just got new work shirts. And the old ones I got replacements for look new. I can't tell which are which. This is a A+++++ Works Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Troy Opsal

customer_reviews.title: I applied it to his collar a day before or few hours before washing
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use and so far it works on my husband shirts. I put it on for few hours before washing, sometimes I put it on his shirt collars a day before, it's seems to work
customer_reviews.author: Faithful

customer_reviews.title: No worries
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job cleaning not fond of the way sprays out at the end but many products get wasted at the end only if you have perfected being able to use the full amount of product in a squeezer The main reason I bought it was to work on stains which is what it does
customer_reviews.author: Puppy mom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome !!
customer_reviews.text: It works well & fast even with hand washing or with spot washing That's why I dont need the Tide to go This isn't any ordinary Shout or any run of the mill stain remover
customer_reviews.author: Maryanne Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great stain remover!
customer_reviews.text: It seems my husband has been mud wrestling after work in his clothes. He bought a bar of some kind of stain remover that didn't work great so I order this. Got 93% of stains removed so it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Wambsganz

customer_reviews.title: This really works!
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time during laundry. I check for spots and stains, give them a spray, and they’re good to go in the washing machine. I’ve been pleasantly surprised at how effective Shout is in removing spots and stains that I thought wouldn’t come out.
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I think the product works great. My son got green icing all over this white shirt and this stuff got rid of it almost completely. There are still faint green remnants, but you'd have to be pretty close to see those. So while it's not a 100% "stain eraser," I'd still give it an A!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Lee

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and fast. I have a clumsy best friend and she has spilled wine, beer, candlewax, pomegranate, and other various things onto my medium light colored carpet. This spray has gotten out all of those stains completely with little scrubbing or effort somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Bizarro girl

customer_reviews.title: If you have taken an unscheduled bath in the lobster butter dish
customer_reviews.text: I did that - my waitress said - as soon as I get home- spray my clothes and also use Dawn Dish detergent. Saved the day - no permanent stains!
customer_reviews.author: der43

customer_reviews.title: Great for white shirts
customer_reviews.text: This spray is good for removing most stains, but i use it particularly for yellow stains in the armpits of white shirts. It really helps get rid of them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Byrone

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: The new formula pulls out even dried in stains. I was shocked when I pulled out a pillowcase that I thought was stained forever, and it looked brand new. I now have this on AutoShip.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cap was loose and leaked into the packing
customer_reviews.text: Cap wasn’t tight and leaked creating a mess but I love the product - just not the security of the liquid inside protected or sealed well. Cap was very loose
customer_reviews.author: MEJ

customer_reviews.title: Stain remover that works!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for stains. Just spray over the stain and forget about it until you're ready to wash! This is a full sized bottle- great value! Has saved a lot of clothes from the trash!
customer_reviews.author: Liz C

customer_reviews.title: good stain remover for messy boys !
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this stain remover for a while and like it more than oxy clean . everything came intact . the bottle or sprayer was not broken and there was no leaking !
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Works good overall
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it works well. I have an old bottle of Spray n Wash, and I think that works a little better overall. However, for the price I paid, it was a good deal and still works well overall.
customer_reviews.author: Ga Boy

customer_reviews.title: Set in stains are no match...
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! It gets ALL the stains out! Even set in ones. I've had no problems getting grass, oil, chocolate, and even finger paint out of my kids clothing!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie d.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t spray
customer_reviews.text: The sprayer does not work at all . Not even a dribble . How will I ever know if it works if I can’t spray it ........threw box away already .
customer_reviews.author: JAmcAA

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Life changer!! My toddlers always have a stain on their clothes but since I have found this my life has been alot better. Their clothes look like nothing ever happened! So glad I found this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oldie but goodie!
customer_reviews.text: Great for getting all stains like coffee and dirt from even white clothes. New staple in my laundry room. The best for my bf’s work shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: My go to for grease stains
customer_reviews.text: I finally figured out how to get grease stains out of my kids’ clothes without a ton of effort. When I notice them as they come out of the dryer, I spray them with this, let sit overnight, then spray again and wash on hot. Hasn’t failed me yet! The only downside to this product is that the little “straw” inside is angled funny, so as you get to the bottom of it you have to hold it and the clothes at an awkward angle to get the product out.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Great stain remover
customer_reviews.text: Get my stains out, I really like this product because both my son and husband get stuff on there clothes all the time and I just use this before I throw it in the wash and it gets all the stains out!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Baney

customer_reviews.title: DIDNT WORK
customer_reviews.text: I left this on my shirt once for a few seconds once for a few minutes and then for over an hour. followed the instructons but it did not remove any stains. its more of a liquid than a gel
customer_reviews.author: CE

customer_reviews.title: Mostly effective
customer_reviews.text: Usually does a pretty good job removing stains and doesn't damage the clothing. Sometimes takes a few washes to get stains out.
customer_reviews.author: Valente

customer_reviews.title: Great product! My husband is a mechanic so his ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My husband is a mechanic so his clothes are always dirty, have a lot of stains from oil,gas and this is the only product that saves me. After using it his clothes are like new, no stains at all. Recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for messy toddlers clothing stains
customer_reviews.text: After 2 years of searching for something to get spots out of clothing for my baby now toddler I finally found something that gets out the spots without much work!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: This works on some stains but doesn’t clean most off my children’s clothing. Especially Greece stains. I was hoping for better results, but I will have to continue my search.
customer_reviews.author: Pirumyan

customer_reviews.title: Follow the directions
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a stain and honestly, it works best when you follow the direction (aka spray, wait the 5-10 minutes!!!) so I am pretty satisfied. I just wish the product was a bit thinner when it sprayed out.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra A

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Consistent with my past experience, this is a solid product. This particular flavor was easy to use and appeared to be effective.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: I haven't actually used this Shout but I use it all the time so I am going with a great review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't remove any stains.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this looking to remove some stains from spit up on baby clothes and it didn't remove much at all and I used an entire bottle for one load for each piece. Smells nice, that's about it. Wouldn't buy again, I tried for some regular stains on white clothes that can't be bleached. Didn't do anything to make a dent in the stains on different fabrics.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney L.

customer_reviews.title: Gets out old stains
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works. Period. I sprayed it on stains that had gone untouched through previous washings and poof, they went away. Tough stuff! And it doesn’t leave a weird residue or ring around the area of the stain.
customer_reviews.author: J M

customer_reviews.title: Careful when you open package that it doesn’t leak on you!
customer_reviews.text: Good product but top wasn’t screwed on completely and some had leaked out into the protective plastic bag. Not worth returning as I needed to use it today.
customer_reviews.author: Merklee

customer_reviews.title: very efficient
customer_reviews.text: I used it to clean some "after camping" spots on the light grey interior fabric in my car. it cleans perfectly, even without rinsing.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

product_meta.title: Shout Spray and Wash Advanced Action Stain Remover for Clothes, 22 oz
product_meta.description: Size:22 Ounce (Pack of 1)Shout Advanced Stain Remover Gel 22 oz
feature_bullets: This super concentrated gel is specially formulated to tackle those stubborn, set in stains and works great on everyday stains too
70percentage more stain fighting surfactants to treat difficult, set in stains
